text:
Add the tag `$:/tags/RawMarkupWikified/BottomBody` to [[CryptedImageBackground]] or [[CryptedVideoBackground]].

;Online tools

* https://yqnn.github.io/svg-path-editor/ - Path editor
* https://jakearchibald.github.io/svgomg/ - SVG optimizer

;Background patterns sites

* https://leaverou.github.io/css3patterns/ - CSS
* http://www.heropatterns.com/ - SVG
* https://www.svgbackgrounds.com/ - SVG
* https://tartanify.com/ - SVG and PNG
* https://doodad.dev/pattern-generator/ - SVG, CSS, and PNG
* http://mazeletter.xyz/ - SVG
* https://www.noisetexturegenerator.com/ - JPG

;URL image encoding

* `<<datauri "Motovun Jack.jpg">>`

;URL SVG encoding

SVG without URL encoding only works in Webkit based browsers. URL encoding will make it work everywhere : 

* replace `<` , `>` , `#` by  `%3C`, `%3E` , `%23` respectively.
** Using filters : `+[encodeuri[]search-replace:g[#],[%23]search-replace:g[%20],[ ]]`  or `+[encodeuricomponent[]]`
** Online tool : https://yoksel.github.io/url-encoder/
* SVG must have the xmlns attribute : `xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'`
* Final URL format : `"data:image/svg+xml,..SVG code here.."`
